1.title: Hoff the Record
1.plot: David heads to Arizona in a last-ditch effort to convince Taylor to stay in school, but Taylor is impatient to get home and start up a band with her sister. Hayley gets her big break when she lands a role on a TV series, but this means she won't have much time to devote to the band with her sister, and David finds himself stuck in a house with two daughters at each other's necks.

imdb.plot outline: Whether you recognize him from "Knight Rider," "Baywatch," or "America's Got Talent," there is no disputing the iconic status of "The Hoff." In between stints on TV, starring roles on Broadway, live performances and business ventures that have taken him worldwide, he is also a single dad, raising two very driven daughters - Taylor Ann, 20, and Hayley, 18. Hayley recently starred in the series "Huge" and is signed with Ford Models, and Taylor Ann guest-starred on "The Young and the Restless," and is a communications major at the University of Arizona. The Hasselhoff girls also form the group "Bella Vida," which has toured with their dad abroad, and are currently working on an album. With three entertainers, three big personalities and an unparalleled sibling rivalry between the girls in the house, there is never a dull moment with the Hasselhoffs. And throughout it all, David proves he is a dedicated father who will do anything to help guide and inspire his daughters as they pursue careers in entertainment.
imdb.title: The Hasselhoffs

The Hasselhoff girls also form the group "Bella Vida," which has toured with their dad abroad, and are currently working on an album. With three entertainers, three big personalities and an unparalleled sibling rivalry between the girls in the house, there is never a dull moment with the Hasselhoffs.
